Author: Supload
Title: [ANN][AIRDROP][ICO] SUPLOAD ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Decentralized Social Media Platform ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Body: WEBSITE | TOKEN SALE | WHITEPAPER | TECHNICAL WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM     Token Sale Starts: July 30, 2018  Token Utility on Day One! What? Tokens that can be used already? Yes, the tokens will have their beginning stages of utilization ready for the day that the first tokens are distributed and sold. Read More About Our Token Utilities  Supload was founded in 2005 as an image and file sharing service. We re-launched in 2016 (bitcoin.com feature article) as a content monetization platform that shared advertising revenue with content creators via cryptocurrencies. In 2018, we are taking it a step further by creating a completely decentralized social media platform! We would like to introduce you to the SUP Token. The SUP Token, an Ethereum ERC223 utility token, will utilize technologies such as Ethereum's Plasma, Lightning Network, and Civic. The utilities available in the token will be a game changer within the social media ecosystem. The SUP Token is the solution to all of the modern day social media problems plaguing popular sites such as Reddit, Youtube, and Facebook. The experience and knowledge of the content industry is led by our CMO, the king of viral content (and karma!) on Reddit, u/GallowBoob. We encourage you to read our standard whitepaper, technical whitepaper, and also join us on Telegram!   Airdrop? Bounties? Contests? Don't miss any future information! Create an account on our site and start participating in the already existing community of over 40,000 registered users.  Bounty campaign information will be coming shortly. Whitepaper translators - please post in the thread or message us if you are interested in helping us and the community with your services.  Thank you!  We're Live! - https://supload.com Token Sale - https://supload.com/ico Contact Email - help@supload.com Telegram - https://t.me/Supload Twitter - SuploadOfficial

Author: Supload
Title: [ANN][AIRDROP][ICO] SUPLOAD ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Decentralized Social Media Platform ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Body: We realize that Rome was not built in a day, but we will provide a platform that incentivizes everyone in the ecosystem. From content creators, users, and even moderators... every contributive action on the platform will result in positive reciprocation that you just cannot find on any existing service.   How will your project be monetized? Great question. Various routes of monetization are covered in detail in the whitepaper. The main source of monetization for creators will be a revenue split from advertisements between creators and the platform. There will be also be additional monetization amongst users via tipping, paid content options, and through the decentralized moderation system as mentioned above.
